animeTitle: Deimos no Hanayome: Ran no Kumikyoku
animeDescription: Two siblings were happy on Mt. Olympus, until they fell in love. Deimo's sister Venus got imprisoned in the Swamp of Death. To save Venus's life, he must find a human reincarnation so that they can continue their love.(Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Nozawa, Nachi', 'Shou, Mayumi', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto', 'Fujita, Toshiko', 'Kusao, Takeshi', 'Mutou, Reiko']
animeStaff: [['Rintaro', 'Director'], ['Hamasaki, Hiroshi', 'Character Design, Key Animation, Animation Director'], ['Oga, Kazuo', 'Background Art'], ['Nakura, Yasuhiro', 'Key Animation']]
